name: Run Together!
description:
Run Together! is an endless runner made for the Black and White Jam №44444...

It uses a dither effect in which there's only black and white pixels in specific patterns, being able to mimic multiple shades of grey at a distance!

Control two runners simultaneously, jumping over the obstacles to gain points! You can play alone or with a friend locally!

Controls: Runner 1 Runner 2
  • W to Jump
  • A to left
  • D to right
  • ↑ to Jump
  • ← to left
  • → to right
